Description: GADM level area used for the gadm_shapes. Codes are country-dependent but roughly: 0: country,1: region/county-like,2: municipality-like.
True: shape polygons are simplified else no
True: all input files are downloaded again and replace the existing files.
True: Logging is printed in the console.
Reference year used to derive shapes info on population and info on GDP.
Number of processes to be used in build_shapes.

"Specifies how population is added to every shape: "standard" pulls from web 1kmx1km raster; "api" pulls from API 100mx100m raster; false (not "false") no population addition to shape. This is useful when generating only cutout."
"Specifies how GDP is added to every shape: "standard" pulls from web 1x1km raster; false (not "false") no gdp addition to shape. This is useful when generating only cutout."
"Specifies what to do with contended countries: "set_by_country" assigns the contended areas to the countries according to the GADM database; "drop" drops the contended areas from the model."
